comment.author: 47945488@N06
comment._content: what an interesting photo, do you have any history? it looks like a spray of water near the statue... is that the tarp being removed? who is it? as usual great stuff.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: Glad you like this one! The statue's of Fr William Casey (1844-1907) who was parish priest of Abbeyfeale from 1883 to 1907 and founded the local branch of the Land League to help tenants farmers fight for their rights. Think this unveiling happened in 1910.
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
